population
Hello blank fragment
A member of your village contracted and spread itching disease! The population suffered a little for it.
Boils. Everyone has boils. Your population has suffered greatly.
A traveling prophet has foretold the end is nigh. Some of your villagers have been scared away.
Your village\'s water supply was polluted. Your population has suffered severe losses.
An epidemic of the bubonic plague spread to your village. The population suffered heavy losses.
A mild drought caused crops to perform poorly this month. Your village\'s farms took a little damage.
A blight of locusts invaded your village and ate through your crops! Your village\'s farms experienced significant difficulty.
A powerful storm washed away valuable farmland and equipment. Your village\'s farms took moderate damage.
Your village was attacked by dragons! Your village\'s farms suffered significant losses.
A wildfire burned through your crops. Your village\'s farms took heavy damage.
A freakishly large and ferocious bear has rampaged through the village. Your fortifications took a little damage.
Bandits have raided your village and stolen valuable weapons. Your fortifications have been significantly weakened.
A tribe of barbarians has attacked your village. No lives were lost, but your fortifications took moderate damage.
Your people favor Pacifism. Your fortifications have suffered significant losses.
A neighboring kingdom has attacked your village. You\'ve fended off the enemy, but your village\'s fortifications have been heavily damaged.
Heavy rain has caused massive flooding throughout the village. Your houses took a little damage.
A lightening strike to a thatched roof caused a fire to break out. Your houses took significant damage.
The housing bubble burst. Families now face foreclosure and demolition of their homes. Your houses have taken moderate damage.
Your village has a growing termite infestation. Your houses have been greatly damaged.
A pack of giants has trampled through your village. Your houses have been heavily damaged.
A virtually rodent-free enclosure. The perfect starter home for your village\'s families.
Are your villagers sick of sleeping on the floor in their huts? Try this compact, cozy dwelling featuring multiple rooms and mattresses.
Have you always dreamed of having horses and sheep right outside your window? This house is not equipped for stabling animals, but it\'s got plenty of rustic charm! And windows!
A country estate worthy of the finest nobles.
Now that\'s a big house. I bet you could fit a dragon in here. But maybe don\'t try that; not exactly fire-proof.
A whole field of wheat. Perfect for making bread. Peasants love bread.
A diverse patch of vegetables sure to keep your people healthy.
A place to keep your cows and sheep and horses. For milking? Shearing? Eating? You decide.
Mmm. Corn. Your villagers will eat this up.
What a beautiful way to spend the day - strolling through the apple trees with sun on your face... The villagers are going to love this place.
A basic siege weapon. Probably better for attacking than defending, but your villagers will take what they can get.
This may look like a pile of rubble, and it certainly is. But those heavy, jagged stones are more than a match for most human foes.
The tallest guard tower around! You\'ll see the enemy coming from miles away. Doubles as a panic room for the village.
Walls of weapons. Enough said.
More extensive walls of weapons. Plus solid rock walls lined with steel for good measure. Plus a library of military history!
